verses.verse: And the chief <WH7218> fathers <WH1> of the families <WH4940> of the children <WH1121> of Gilead, <WH1568> the son <WH1121> of Machir, <WH4353> the son <WH1121> of Manasseh, <WH4519> of the families <WH4940> of the sons <WH1121> of Joseph, <WH3130> came <WH7126> near, <WH5066> and spoke <WH1696> before <WH6440> Moses, <WH4872> and before <WH6440> the princes, <WH5387> the chief <WH7218> fathers <WH1> of the children <WH1121> of Israel: <WH3478>

And they said, <WH559> The LORD <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> my lord <WH113> to give <WH5414> the land <WH776> for an inheritance <WH5159> by lot <WH1486> to the children <WH1121> of Israel: <WH3478> and my lord <WH113> was commanded <WH6680> by the LORD <WH3068> to give <WH5414> the inheritance <WH5159> of Zelophehad <WH6765> our brother <WH251> to his daughters. <WH1323>

And if they be married <WH802> to any <WH259> of the sons <WH1121> of the other <WH259> tribes <WH7626> of the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> then shall their inheritance <WH5159> be taken <WH1639> from the inheritance <WH5159> of our fathers, <WH1> and shall be put <WH3254> to the inheritance <WH5159> of the tribe <WH4294> whereunto they are received: <WH1961> so shall it be taken <WH1639> from the lot <WH1486> of our inheritance. <WH5159>

And when <WH518> the jubilee <WH3104> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> shall be, then shall their inheritance <WH5159> be put <WH3254> to the inheritance <WH5159> of the tribe <WH4294> whereunto <WH834> they are received: <WH1961> so shall their inheritance <WH5159> be taken <WH1639> away from the inheritance <WH5159> of the tribe <WH4294> of our fathers. <WH1>

And Moses <WH4872> commanded <WH6680> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> according <WH5921> to the word <WH6310> of the LORD, <WH3068> saying, <WH559> The tribe <WH4294> of the sons <WH1121> of Joseph <WH3130> has said <WH1696> well. <WH3651>

This <WH2088> is the thing <WH1697> which <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> does command <WH6680> concerning the daughters <WH1323> of Zelophehad, <WH6765> saying, <WH559> Let them marry <WH802> to whom they think <WH5869> best; <WH2896> only <WH389> to the family <WH4940> of the tribe <WH4294> of their father <WH1> shall they marry. <WH802>

So shall not the inheritance <WH5159> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> remove <WH5437> from tribe <WH4294> to tribe: <WH4294> for every <WH376> one <WH376> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> shall keep <WH1692> himself to the inheritance <WH5159> of the tribe <WH4294> of his fathers. <WH1>

And every <WH3605> daughter, <WH1323> that possesses <WH3423> an inheritance <WH5159> in any tribe <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> shall be wife <WH802> to one <WH259> of the family <WH4940> of the tribe <WH4294> of her father, <WH1> that the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> may enjoy <WH3423> every man <WH376> the inheritance <WH5159> of his fathers. <WH1>

Neither <WH3808> shall the inheritance <WH5159> remove <WH5437> from one tribe <WH4294> to another <WH312> tribe; <WH4294> but every <WH376> one <WH376> of the tribes <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> shall keep <WH1692> himself to his own inheritance. <WH5159>
Even as the LORD <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> Moses, <WH4872> so <WH3651> did <WH6213> the daughters <WH1323> of Zelophehad: <WH6765>

For Mahlah, <WH4244> Tirzah, <WH8656> and Hoglah, <WH2295> and Milcah, <WH4435> and Noah, <WH5270> the daughters <WH1323> of Zelophehad, <WH6765> were married <WH802> to their father's <WH1730> brothers' <WH1730> sons: <WH1121>

And they were married <WH802> into the families <WH4940> of the sons <WH1121> of Manasseh <WH4519> the son <WH1121> of Joseph, <WH3130> and their inheritance <WH5159> remained <WH1961> in the tribe <WH4294> of the family <WH4940> of their father. <WH1>

These <WH428> are the commandments <WH4687> and the judgments, <WH4941> which <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> by the hand <WH3027> of Moses <WH4872> to the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> in the plains <WH6160> of Moab <WH4124> by Jordan <WH3383> near Jericho. <WH3405>
